text: I Want to Die in New Orleans is the first studio album by American hip hop duo, Suicideboys. I Want to Die in New Orleans was released on September 7, 2018. The album was first teased by $crim of Suicideboys in Feburary 2017 and was first going to be called I Don't Want to Die in New Orleans. They would later confirm this in an interview with XXL. The album is explores themes of depression, self-reflection and drug addiction. The album debuted at #9 on the Billboard 200 and selling 49,000 album-equivalent units. I Want to Die in New Orleans would be certified Gold by theRecording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The album featured the singles "Carrollton", and "Meet Mr. Niceguy". ==Songs== ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:Debut albums
title: I Want to Die in New Orleans
